text: Construct a LL(1) parsing table for the following LL(1) grammar: S - ABCDE A-a Boble Cocle D-d Eoele Note, T(X, Y is the production with which variable X will be expanded, when the look-ahead symbol is Y. Also, "T(X, ¥) = error" means that there is no production with which to expand X on look-ahead Y. Which of the following table-entries of predictive parsing table for given grammar is/are correct? (@) T(E, $) =E- ¢ (b TA, o) =A—a ©TC d=Coe @ TB,=B-e
